local_intent: Pin the cloth by lowering until contact is detected, with the gripper at 90°, retrying up to 3 times if contact is not sensed.
assumptions: Robot is already near the cloth area
Cloth is visible to the camera
coherence_with_global: Aligns with the global sequence: verify visibility, set yaw to 90°, align to cloth edge, then LowerUntilContact and confirm contact; includes retry consistent with failure-and-recovery logic.
